title: [BUG] - Getting memory crash issue when trying to load data in redis-stack through docker
body:
**Describe the bug**

We're running Redis-stack image in docker container and trying to create indexing and load data but unfortunately we're getting these errors in console please have a look:

![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/c1829bb4-6882-4ef4-af35-e4c522ed8b19)

![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/7466b01f-a001-44a9-a5d9-818e5627aa3b)0)

![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/4b7f0aea-10d4-431b-95a9-1bc55e9645b3)
 
![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/350b6b6d-c789-43a8-9cfb-bf963b483780)

![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/e03d682f-146a-46ee-8e22-d7cd28c94532)

![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/114138445/786de7e8-b061-4743-bd05-bffc06ab2ae5)



**How we load the data**

When placing the dump.rdb file in both /var/lib/redis-stack and /data/dump.rdb, Redis encounters errors during vector indexing and data loading.
